title: Young Australian Daniel Jackson says he is president of his own European country
desc: Daniel Jackson says he has started his own country, Verdis, in Europe.

title: Researchers in Australia open 'window to the brain' with new cancer-detecting chip
desc: SYDNEY: Scientists in Australia have developed a diagnostic device that can tell how deadly brain tumours respond to treatment from a simple blood test, in what they describe as a "window to the brain," reported Xinhua.

title: Hansi Flick talks Yamal, De Jong, Fermin, Olmo after Elche 1-3 Barcelona
desc: Chances were in no shortage when Barcelona took on Elche at Estadio Martinez Valero on Saturday night, as the Catalans simply dominated and produced an xG of over 6 against Eder Sarabia’s men. What they failed to do, however, was convert their chances and deliver a dominant scoreline, and it was only a 3-1 lead that they […]

title: Angela Rayner has already launched campaign to replace Keir Starmer
desc: The former Deputy Leader has raised a £1 million war chest for her bid to become the new Labour leader - and there are two other candidates

title: New ADHD Prescriptions Easier From Feb 1
desc: As of 1 February 2026, changes to New Zealand's prescribing rules for Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) stimulant medicines have come

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Centre announces sustainable mountain trails for J&K, other states
desc: Presenting the Budget in Parliament, Sitharaman said that Jammu and Kashmir will be development for ecologically sustainable mountain trails

title: Estonia plans to create smaller pig farms to reduce swine fever outbreak risks
desc: The Estonian state plans to create smaller pig farms in the future to protect farmers against African swine fever (ASF) outbreaks, but the continued spread of the disease in Europe and falling pork prices are making investments difficult.

title: When the ducks quacked war: the night Israel almost went to war by accident
desc: A late-night IDF call-up broadcast on April 1, 1959, meant as a routine drill, panicked civilians, rattled the Knesset, mobilized Arab armies and forced senior generals to resign before officials admitted it was only an exercise

title: The Kazakhstan billionaire behind Elena Rybakina’s Open triumph
desc: A diplomat and industrialist, he funded the career of the Russian-born player who won her second grand slam and first Australian Open.

title: Police appeal for information on missing 31-year-old man last seen in Joo Chiat area
desc: Police on Feb 1 issued an appeal for information regarding the whereabouts of Mr Cavan Yeo Ying Yong, 31.
